column1: Cognate with Old Turkic 𐰀𐰲 ‎(āç, “hungry”), Old Uighur [script needed] ‎(aç, “hungry”), Karakhanid [script needed] ‎(āç, “hungry”), Azeri ac ‎(“hungry”), Bashkir ас ‎(as, “hungry”), Chuvash выҫӑ ‎(vyśă, “hunger, hungry”), Kazakh аш ‎(aş, “hunger”), Khakas ас ‎(as, “hunger, hungry”), Kipchak [Arabic needed] ‎(aç, “hungry”), Kyrgyz ач ‎(aç, “hungry”), Southern Altai ач ‎(ač, “hunger”), Turkmen āç ‎(“hungry”), Tuvan аш ‎(aš, “hunger, hungry”), Uyghur ئاچ ‎(ach, “hungry”), Uzbek och ‎(“hungry”), Yakut аас ‎(aas, “hunger”).
